italian.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
italian.ingredients: Spaghetti, eggs, bacon, parmesan cheese, black pepper
italian.steps: 1. Cook spaghetti until al dente. 2. Fry bacon until crispy. 3. Mix eggs, cheese, and pepper. 4. Combine everything.

italian.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
italian.steps: 1. Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. 2. Grill chicken. 3. Prepare tomato sauce. 4. Combine and simmer.

italian.title: Chocolate Cake
italian.ingredients: Flour, sugar, cocoa powder, eggs, butter, milk
italian.steps: 1. Mix dry ingredients. 2. Beat eggs and butter. 3. Combine wet ingredients. 4. Bake in preheated oven.

italian.title: Margarita Pizza
italian.ingredients: Pizza dough, tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, basil, olive oil
italian.steps: 1. Roll out pizza dough. 2. Spread tomato sauce. 3. Add cheese and basil. 4. Drizzle with olive oil.

italian.title: Berry Smoothie
italian.steps: 1. Blend berries and banana. 2. Add yogurt and honey. 3. Blend until smooth.

italian.title: Baked Ham with Red Caviar
italian.steps: 1. Bake ham. 2. Top with butter and red caviar. 3. Garnish with herbs.

italian.title: Deep-fried Mozzarella Cheese Balls
italian.steps: 1. Coat mozzarella in breadcrumbs and egg. 2. Deep-fry until golden.

italian.title: Hamburger and Chips
italian.ingredients: Ground beef, buns, lettuce, tomato, potatoes, oil
italian.steps: 1. Grill beef patty. 2. Assemble burger with lettuce and tomato. 3. Fry potatoes.

italian.title: Cheesy Chicken
italian.ingredients: Chicken breasts, cheese, breadcrumbs, eggs, oil
italian.steps: 1. Coat chicken in egg and breadcrumbs. 2. Fry until golden. 3. Top with cheese and bake.
